import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const IndexPage = () => { const history = useNavigate(); return (

Welcome to Ishuri Hub

Your one-stop solution for managing student and parent data

About Ishuri Hub

Ishuri Hub is a comprehensive platform designed to help schools manage their student and parent data efficiently. Our platform provides a user-friendly interface for administrators, teachers, and parents to access and manage information seamlessly.

Features

Student Management

Manage student data, track performance, and communicate with students and parents.

Parent Management

Keep track of parent information and maintain effective communication with them.

Notifications

Send notifications to students and parents about important updates and events.

Testimonials

"Ishuri Hub has transformed the way we manage our school data. It's user-friendly and efficient."

- School Administrator

"As a teacher, I can easily track student performance and communicate with parents. Highly recommend!"

- Teacher

"I love how I can stay updated with my child's progress and receive important notifications."

- Parent

Contact Us

© 2023 Ishuri Hub. All rights reserved.

); }; export default IndexPage;
